about_the_game:
Feudal Baron: King's Land: Prologue is the first chapter of the campaign of the full game Feudal Baron: King's Land, thanks to which you can feel the atmosphere of the game.

In Feudal Baron: King's Land: Prologue, you play the role of a baron who manages the land received after the death of your father. You start with just a handful of people who, attracted by the wealth and charm of the surrounding area, have come from nearby villages.
Develop your settlement. Ensure the best flow of goods and services by determining the impact areas of buildings. Make difficult decisions. Issue decrees that influence the life and development of the entire medieval settlement.
detailed_description:
Check out more games from our publisher



About the Game


Feudal Baron: King's Land: Prologue is the first chapter of the campaign of the full game Feudal Baron: King's Land, thanks to which you can feel the atmosphere of the game.

In Feudal Baron: King's Land: Prologue, you play the role of a baron who manages the land received after the death of your father. You start with just a handful of people who, attracted by the wealth and charm of the surrounding area, have come from nearby villages.
Develop your settlement. Ensure the best flow of goods and services by determining the impact areas of buildings. Make difficult decisions. Issue decrees that influence the life and development of the entire medieval settlement.
name: Feudal Baron: King's Land: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 4GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700K, AMD Ryzen 5 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 8GB

short_description: Would you make a good Feudal Baron? Establish and develop a medieval settlement. Create a prosperous city, take care of its inhabitants and make tough decisions.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
